H0.text: A Violent Storm is which number on the Beaufort Scale. 8

H1.text: A Violent Storm is which number on the Beaufort Scale. 9

H2.text: A Violent Storm is which number on the Beaufort Scale. 6

H3.text: A Violent Storm is which number on the Beaufort Scale. 11

A4.text: Violent Storm Force Warnings are issued if Beaufort force 11 or frequent gusts of at least 69 knots are expected.

A5.text: Strong Gale Warnings are issued if Beaufort force 9 or frequent gusts of at least 52 knots are expected.
